nodes.text: Oolovv was a Wookiee freedom fighter. He helped to organize the Life Day festivities following 0 BBY in the towns of Dearic, Wayfar, and Doaba Guerfel. He also rewarded people sympathetic to the cause of the Rebellion that helped in the preparations and realization of the festivities with various presents.

Oolovv was a non-player character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. During the Life Day live event from December 16, 2008 to January 12, 2009, he could be found near the cantinas of Dearic, Wayfar, and Doaba Guerfel. He returned for the Life Day events of 2009, 2010, and 2011.

For decorating trees throughout the cities, Rebel-aligned players were rewarded special Rebel Alliance Propaganda Tokens that could be redeemed for decorative items by talking to Oolovv. Imperial players had to talk to the Trandoshan Sstrigge instead.
